channel.title: Delta Base - Autospawn.cfg error
channel.description:
I am trying to add a new shop into my server and everything is correct apart from the new addition to autospawn.cfg. I first used spaces but to try and fix I used tabs but even after that I get an error when I open Run.bat:
[code=Show]Starting System... Enforcing client requirement. Settings Loaded Seccessfully! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 Fire giant Dungeon" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2334) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:623) at server.main(server.java:122) Online. [/code]

item.title: Delta Base - Autospawn.cfg error
item.dc:creator: @faor734dpd faor734dpd
item.description:
@faor734dpd wrote:

I am trying to add a new shop into my server and everything is correct apart from the new addition to autospawn.cfg. I first used spaces but to try and fix I used tabs but even after that I get an error when I open Run.bat:

Starting System... Enforcing client requirement. Settings Loaded Seccessfully! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 Fire giant Dungeon" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2334) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:623) at server.main(server.java:122) Online.
